languages.text: "Обвинения в сношениях с мон-кай — такой пустяк в сравнении с попыткой устроить дизъюнкцию... если бы я знал! Если бы Иремерисс не сумела скрыть это от меня..." {n}Маражай прикрывает глаза, размышляя о чем-то.{/n} "Интересно, сколько раз Назракей проклял себя за то, что не сверг Иремерисс на Обсидиановом суде, когда была такая возможность? Он по незнанию дал право жить той, кого приговорил его правитель — вряд ли оправдания помогут ему при ближайшей аудиенции с Вектом".

"The accusations of consorting with mon-keigh are such a trifle compared to an attempt to bring about a dysjunction... If only I had known it! Had Yremeryss not managed to keep it secret from me..." {n}Marazhai shields his eyes, contemplating something.{/n} "I wonder how many times Nazrakhei cursed himself for not overthrowing Yremeryss at the Obsidian Court when he had the chance? He had unknowingly spared the one his ruler had condemned. Hardly an excuse that will help him at his next meeting with Vect."
languages.original_text: "Обвинения в сношениях с мон-кай — такой пустяк в сравнении с попыткой устроить дизъюнкцию... если бы я знал! Если бы Иремерисс не сумела скрыть это от меня..." {n}Маражай прикрывает глаза, размышляя о чем-то.{/n} "Интересно, сколько раз Назракей проклял себя за то, что не сверг Иремерисс на Обсидиановом суде, когда была такая возможность? Он по незнанию дал право жить той, кого приговорил его правитель — вряд ли оправдания помогут ему при ближайшей аудиенции с Вектом".

Had Yremeryss not managed to keep it secret from me..." {n}Marazhai closes his eyes, contemplating something.{/n} "I wonder how many times Nazrakhei cursed himself for not overthrowing Yremeryss at the Obsidian Court when he had the chance? He had unknowingly spared the one his ruler had condemned. Hardly an excuse that will help him at the next audience with Vect."

languages.text: « Pactiser avec des mon-keigh ne pèse pas lourd à côté d'une tentative de disjonction... Si seulement je l'avais su plus tôt ! Si seulement Yremeryss n'avait pas réussi à me dissimuler tout ça... » {n}Marazhai ferme les yeux un instant pour mieux organiser ses pensées.{/n} « Je me demande combien de fois Nazrakhei s'est maudit de ne pas avoir profité de l'occasion pour renverser Yremeryss à la Cour d'Obsidienne. Sans le savoir, il a épargné celle que son dirigeant avait condamnée. Cela risque de ne pas lui rendre service lors de sa prochaine rencontre avec Vect. »
languages.original_text: "The accusations of consorting with mon-keigh are such a trifle compared to an attempt to bring about a dysjunction... If only I had known it! Had Yremeryss not managed to keep it secret from me..." {n}Marazhai shields his eyes, contemplating something.{/n} "I wonder how many times Nazrakhei cursed himself for not overthrowing Yremeryss at the Obsidian Court when he had the chance? He had unknowingly spared the one his ruler had condemned. Hardly an excuse that will help him at his next meeting with Vect."

traits.locale_text: « Pactiser avec des mon-keigh ne pèse pas lourd à côté d'une tentative de disjonction... Si seulement je l'avais su plus tôt ! Si seulement Yremeryss n'avait pas réussi à me dissimuler tout ça... » {n}Marazhai ferme les yeux un instant pour mieux organiser ses pensées.{/n} « Je me demande combien de fois Nazrakhei s'est maudit pour ne pas avoir profité de l'occasion pour renverser Yremeryss à la Cour d'Obsidienne. Sans le savoir, il a épargné celle que son dirigeant avait condamnée. Cela risque de ne pas lui rendre service lors de sa prochaine rencontre avec Vect. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “与分裂黑暗之城的罪名相比，和猴子厮混的罪名实在是微不足道……如果我早知道这些事情就好了！如果不是伊芮梅莉斯一直瞒着我的话……”{n}玛拉斋捂住眼睛，深思着什么。{/n}“不知道纳札骸有没有后悔，后悔没借着这个机会，在黑曜王庭为伊芮梅莉斯定罪？我很好奇，不知道他会因为这件事情咒骂自己多少次？他无意间饶恕了被他的君王判下死刑的人。等他下次和维克特见面的时候，恐怕他的日子不会太好过。”
languages.original_text: "The accusations of consorting with mon-keigh are such a trifle compared to an attempt to bring about a dysjunction... If only I had known it! Had Yremeryss not managed to keep it secret from me..." {n}Marazhai shields his eyes, contemplating something.{/n} "I wonder how many times Nazrakhei cursed himself for not overthrowing Yremeryss at the Obsidian Court when he had the chance? He had unknowingly spared the one his ruler had condemned. Hardly an excuse that will help him at his next meeting with Vect."

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Die Anschuldigungen, mit Chem-Pan-Sey zu verkehren, sind eine absolute Nichtigkeit im Vergleich zum Versuch, eine Disjunktion auszulösen ... Hätte ich davon doch nur gewusst! Wenn Yremeryss es nicht geschafft hätte, das vor mir geheim zu halten ..." {n}Marazhai bedeckt seine Augen und grübelt.{/n} "Ich frage mich, wie oft sich Nazrakhei selbst verflucht haben muss, weil er Yremeryss am Obsidianhof nicht gestürzt hat, als Gelegenheit dazu war. Ohne es selbst zu wissen, verschonte er dadurch diejenige, die sein Herrscher verurteilt hatte. Natürlich wird ihm das beim nächsten Treffen mit Vect nichts helfen."
languages.original_text: "The accusations of consorting with mon-keigh are such a trifle compared to an attempt to bring about a dysjunction... If only I had known it! Had Yremeryss not managed to keep it secret from me..." {n}Marazhai shields his eyes, contemplating something.{/n} "I wonder how many times Nazrakhei cursed himself for not overthrowing Yremeryss at the Obsidian Court when he had the chance? He had unknowingly spared the one his ruler had condemned. Hardly an excuse that will help him at his next meeting with Vect."

traits.locale_text: "Die Anschuldigungen, mit Chem-Pan-Sey zu verkehren, sind eine absolute Nichtigkeit im Vergleich zum Versuch, eine Disjunktion auszulösen ... Hätte ich davon doch nur gewusst! Wenn Yremeryss es nicht geschafft hätte, das vor mir geheim zu halten ..." {n}Marazhai bedeckt seine Augen und grübelt.{/n} "Ich frage mich, wie oft sich Nazrakhei selbst verflucht haben muss, weil er Yremeryss am Obsidianhof nicht gestürzt hat, als Gelegenheit dazu war. Ohne es selbst zu wissen, verschonte er dadurch diejenige, die sein Herrscher verurteilt hatte. Natürlich wird ihm das beim nächsten Treffen mit Vect nichts helfen."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Las acusaciones de confraternizar con los mon-keigh son minucias en comparación con la tentativa de provocar una disyunción... ¡ojalá me hubiese enterado antes! Si Yremeryss no me hubiera ocultado este secreto...». {n}Marazhai se cubre los ojos, meditando sobre algo.{/n} «Me pregunto cuántas veces se maldeciría a sí mismo Nazrakhei por no haber derrocado a Yremeryss en la Corte de Obsidiana cuando tuvo la ocasión. Sin saberlo perdonó la vida de aquella a la que su propio soberano había condenado. No le servirá de excusa en su próximo encuentro con Vect».
languages.original_text: "The accusations of consorting with mon-keigh are such a trifle compared to an attempt to bring about a dysjunction... If only I had known it! Had Yremeryss not managed to keep it secret from me..." {n}Marazhai shields his eyes, contemplating something.{/n} "I wonder how many times Nazrakhei cursed himself for not overthrowing Yremeryss at the Obsidian Court when he had the chance? He had unknowingly spared the one his ruler had condemned. Hardly an excuse that will help him at his next meeting with Vect."

traits.locale_text: «Las acusaciones de confraternizar con los mon-keigh son minucias en comparación con la tentativa de provocar una disyunción... ¡ojalá me hubiese enterado antes! Si Yremeryss no me hubiera ocultado este secreto...». {n}Marazhai se cubre los ojos, meditando sobre algo.{/n} «Me pregunto cuántas veces se maldeciría a sí mismo Nazrakhei por no haber derrocado a Yremeryss en la Corte de Obsidiana cuando tuvo la ocasión. Sin saberlo perdonó la vida de aquella a la que su propio soberano había condenado. No le servirá de excusa en su próximo encuentro con Vect».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「モン＝ケイと協力していることに対する非難など、分裂を起こす企てに比べれば些細なことだ…。知ってさえいればだがな！イレメリスがこのことを俺に隠してさえいなければ…」{n}マラズハイは目をそらし、思考を巡らせている。{/n}「オブシディアの法廷でイレメリスを屈服させられなかったことを、ナズラクヘイは何度呪ったことだろうな。知らず知らずのうちに、奴の支配者が断罪した者を助けていた。それはヴェクトとの次の会合で、奴自身を助ける言い訳にはなりにくいだろう」
languages.original_text: "The accusations of consorting with mon-keigh are such a trifle compared to an attempt to bring about a dysjunction... If only I had known it! Had Yremeryss not managed to keep it secret from me..." {n}Marazhai shields his eyes, contemplating something.{/n} "I wonder how many times Nazrakhei cursed himself for not overthrowing Yremeryss at the Obsidian Court when he had the chance? He had unknowingly spared the one his ruler had condemned. Hardly an excuse that will help him at his next meeting with Vect."

traits.locale_text: 「モン＝ケイと協力していることに対する非難など、分裂を起こす企てに比べれば些細なことだ…。知ってさえいればだがな！イレメリスがこのことを俺に隠してさえいなければ…」{n}マラズハイは目をそらし、思考を巡らせている。{/n}「オブシディアの法廷でイレメリスを屈服させられなかったことを、ナズラクヘイは何度呪ったことだろうな。知らず知らずのうちに、奴の支配者が断罪した者を助けていた。それはヴェクトとの次の会合で、奴自身を助ける言い訳にはなりにくいだろう」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Ayrışım çıkarmaya çalışmak dururken mon-keighlerle arkadaşlık suçlamalarının lafı mı olur? Hele bunu bir bileydim! Hele Yremeryss bu sırrı benden saklayamasaydı..." {n}Marazhai, eliyle gözlerini kapatıp düşüncelere dalıyor.{/n} "Acaba Nazrakhei, fırsatı varken Obsidiyen Divan'da Yremeryss'i yerinden etmediği için kaç kez kendine küfretmiştir? Hükümdarının ölüme mahkûm ettiği birisini farkında olmadan ölümden kurtardı. Vect'in karşısında kabahatine bahane edemeyecek de."
languages.original_text: "The accusations of consorting with mon-keigh are such a trifle compared to an attempt to bring about a dysjunction... If only I had known it! Had Yremeryss not managed to keep it secret from me..." {n}Marazhai shields his eyes, contemplating something.{/n} "I wonder how many times Nazrakhei cursed himself for not overthrowing Yremeryss at the Obsidian Court when he had the chance? He had unknowingly spared the one his ruler had condemned. Hardly an excuse that will help him at his next meeting with Vect."

traits.locale_text: "Ayrışım çıkarmaya çalışmak dururken mon-keighlerle arkadaşlık suçlamalarının lafı mı olur? Hele bunu bir bileydim! Hele Yremeryss bu sırrı benden saklayamasaydı..." {n}Marazhai elini gözlerini kapatıyor, düşünceye dalıyor.{/n} "Acaba Nazrakhei, fırsatı varken Obsidiyen Divan'da Yremeryss'i yerinden etmediği için kaç kez kendi kendine küfretmiştir? Hükümdarının ölüme mahkûm ettiği birisini farkında olmadan ölümden kurtardı. Vect'in karşısında bu bahanenin kabahatine faydası olmaz."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
